titleStmt.title: The white robe, or, The undefiled Christian clothed in a vvhite garment held forth in a farewel sermon / preached by Mr. Joseph Caryl at Magnus, August the 17, 1662.
titleStmt.author: Caryl, Joseph, 1602-1673.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Imperfect: p. 18 dark and difficult to read.
